title: How to encourage my daughter to be more social in this quarantine time - Quora

response.answer_text: I guess she's kind of kid who's always in her phone!! If yes don't worry sir it's actually today everybody's doing. How can you bring her out of this situation. Sir please do some activities in your home make some fun learning stuff like playing indoor games, painting, and cooking etc etc. Else please do campfire I mean sit all you guys together and share you wonderful stories that'll motivate them. Therefore the conclusion and the motto of writing this is keep yourself and your loved one's engaging definitely it'll help you.
